descriptionNullable:
I added a new dataset of 513 positive affirmation with 9 tags such as love, blessings, health etc. The dataset was prepared by web scraping with beautifulsoup from the website :-
https://www.loudlife35.com/2019/06/500-positive-affirmations-that-will.html

here is the link :- https://www.kaggle.com/pratiksharm/positive-affirmations-with-tags

why this dataset?
Positive affirmation can have a good effect on our mental health. Self-affirmation such as I am smart, brave, courageous etc, when spoken with confidence increases your self-esteem.

Is there any research behind it?
the one that i have found :-

Self-Affirmations Provide a Broader
Perspective on Self-Threat
https://sites.lsa.umich.edu/sasi/wp-content/uploads/sites/275/2015/11/Critcher_AffPersp.pdf
*note -the positive affirmation are not taken from this articles. I might add them in future
What's the future of the dataset?

The plan is to increase the dataset and find more RP discussing about the positive effect of affirmation on people life.
Create awareness about mental health and well being.
Rest, you can give your suggestions and advices. Your comment is appreciated.
title: Positive affirmations with Tags
subtitle: 513 positive affirmation with 9 tags.
